page.title: 13MORETON SAND&GRAVEL CO. LTD.
page.content: Five of us visted Moreton Sand and Gravel Co. Ltd. It covers 8 acres of farmland but only 3 acres are in use at one time. They employ 5 staff. The gravel is quarried as far as 4Oft. down. It is sorted into stones coarse sand and fine sand. The 1.5 inch stones are bought by farmers for drainage. Most of the gravel is used for ballast for road making. Most of the soft sand is used for school jumping pits. At the gravel pit there is a weighbridge where the lorries have their weight checked when empty and when loaded. The driver has to keep his record card. They sell up to 2OO Tonnes a day. Part of the Co. is called C.J.Plant they hire huge diggers for road making. They helped to make the M.25. One of the pits is a lagoon kept for consevation of local wildlife eg. geese foxes fish & ducks.
